subsection.name: Managing Context
subsection.p: This tutorial presents information about the management of the runtime context supplied to your component.
Resources supporting this tutorial are contained in the tutorials/context/avalon/ package.

subsection.name: Merlin Standard Context Entries
subsection.p: In order to receive a runtime context we need to update the HelloComponent source so that it implements the Avalon Contextualizable lifecycle stage interface. Merlin will build and supply a context object containing the following four context entries:

tr.td: The temporary directory that will be destroyed at the end of the session.

subsection.name: Adding Context Support to the Component
subsection.p: In order to receive a runtime context we need to update the HelloComponent source so that it implements the Avalon Contextualization stage interface. Merlin will build and supply a context object containing the standard four context entries.
